Fishing Index - Fishing Weather App is a app that helps fishermen to fishing scientifically and reasonably.
      Fish activities are related to many weather conditions. The influence of water temperature and atmospheric pressure is most obvious, but the influence of temperature on water temperature is lagging behind and slow, and the change of atmospheric pressure is more intuitive. The higher atmospheric pressure, the higher dissolved oxygen in water, the more active fish activities. Wind speed and direction are also an important factor. The breeze blowing Buddha water surface increases the dissolved oxygen of water. Cold blowing south wind and hot blowing north wind are very beneficial for fishing. Finally, rainfall and humidity also have a certain impact on fishing.
          According to some research, fish activities are most active in about one hour before and after the moontransit (upper or lower), and are also active within half an hour before and after the Moonrise or Moonset. By using signals received by GPS chip in any mobile device, Raining Bell will provide location-based animated information and instant alters according to intensities of near-by radar echoes.

Through methodologies of data assimilation technique and radar reflectivity extrapolation, it integrates most observations of radar stations in  Taiwan and FORMOSAT-7 Radio Occultation. Users can check the real-time radar echo in graphic mode and receive alters of probability of rains in coming hour.

空氣污染警報 -- 台灣空氣警報，當品質變糟或變好時即時推播通知給您，另提供早晚天氣即時預報推播

設定特定站點為推播通知關注點後，當該站點空氣品質變糟或變好時，即時推播通知給您。另外提供站點附近基本天氣預測資料。

此服務為我們原本舊的「台灣空污警報」新改寫的跨平台版本，操作使用邏輯有所變更，所以舊的版本仍會保留以及維護。



這個服務主要取得「行政院環境保護署」所提供的「空氣品質指數」 (Air Quality Index, AQI)，AQI分級計算參考污染物為SO2、NO2、PM10、PM2.5、O3、CO等六項，每小時發布一次。其數值越大、級別和類別越高、表徵顏色越深，說明空氣污染狀況越嚴重，對人體的健康危害也就越大。我們的服務即定時監測各站數的數值，當空氣由良好普通等級進入輕度污染(甚至更嚴重的等級)時，即推播通知您。也可設定相反情形下，即空氣變好時，推播通知您。

另外提供「中央氣象局」的「天氣預報」基本資料以及早晚天氣即時預報推播。

主要功能
- 關注站點的指標等級變糟或變好時，推播通知您。
- 首頁提供各站點的 AQI 資料，以及站點附近的基本天氣資料。依定位所在位置排序，讓您很清楚附近的站點有哪些。
- 預設會開啟地圖頁面，呈現站點所在基本資料。可設定開啟時，不直接進入地圖頁。
- 詳細頁面除了 AQI 以及近 12小時內 AQI 變化之外，也提供一天以及一週內的天氣預報。此頁可設定推播通知功能。
- 提供地震豪雨等氣象特報推播通知功能。
- 提供環保署的空氣品質預報資料

資料來源包括
- 內政部環保署空氣品質資料
- 交通部中央氣象局氣候資料
